title: Olaf Ragnarok inconsistancies.
body:
There is a bug concerning Olaf's Ultimate, Ragnarok. If you cast it while a knockback or knockup spell is traveling towards Olaf, the spell still goes through while you are in Ragnarok form.

The best and most annoying example can be found if Vi uses her Ultimate, Assault and Battery on Olaf. If she casts it, then Olaf reacts and casts his Ultimate as she is travelling towards him, he can still be affected by the knockup, and even worse, be knocked up and stunned for LONGER due to the state applying twice in this form.

The other affected knockback spells I have seen this happen on are Maokai's Arcane Smash (Q), Alistar's Headbutt (W) and Syndra's E+Q combo.

Rioter Admiral BullFrog told me to repost it here to garner more support.

Please fix Olaf. :( - I can't provide video due to my upload being terrible but I can assure if you cast it as the spell comes in you get stuck.

replies.body:
Hey, thanks for taking the time to post this.

I just tried reproducing this issue a few times and wasn't able to.  If Vi ults Olaf and he uses Ragnarok before he gets knocked up, he will not get knocked up.

If I Olaf is already mid air (Vi's ult is JUST hitting him as Olaf uses Ragnarok) Olaf will be knocked up but only for the normal duration.  This part is intended, as you can't remove knockups/knockbacks once they hit you.  To be more specific, Ragnarok should NOT end a knockup effect early (although the tooltip might be a bit misleading)

If this isn't the issue you are seeing, please let me know.  I will likely need a video of the problem or more detailed description of how to make it happen, because all of the cases I checked are working as intended.

Hope this helps, and thanks again!

I know for a fact if you cast your ult as you're running towards a knockback (e.g. Janna Ultimate. This just happened in a game I was playing.) you can get knocked back still. The main difference I notice is this. When you get knocked back, you are normally turned to face away from the target, but Olaf with Ragnarok on will still be facing the target as if he had ignored it, yet his model is still displaced. 

As for Vi's ult, the problem here is that if you Ragnarok on impact or prior to impact, you get 1 of 2 things happening.
1) You either do not get knocked up and just get stunned in place for 5 seconds.
2) You ignore the CC but take the damage, effectively CCing Vi as she is still stuck mid animation while you're beating on her.

So if either are intended, it has be consistent. Please help make Olaf's ult CONSISTENT!


In regards to "lag". On the OCE server I am in the same state as the server, netting in a ping of 15ms. Meaning that if it was to work as I would've hoped, I would actually be able to Ult through most of these instances, but that's not the case, unless you're saying that the person that IS lagging gets the priority cast. I know there is a very short casting animation for Ragnarok that might be the cause of this, but I just wish it could be fixed. I can't make a video of it because I can't get any replays (Rito pls?). LoLreplay doesn't work for me since 4.10, and I don't have the internet to upload anything.


Please help? :(

I think this is somewhat related:
When Quinn vaults at someone, she interrupts them before hitting them. Is this intended? I saw someone being massacred by Quinn as a Lissandra. She tried to stun her under turret when she was mid vault, but was unable to cast anything.
Vault causes a slight knock up and you can't really do anything during a knock up.
oh, i understand that. But what I witnessed was someone being unable to cast abilities while quinn was mid vault (she hadn't hit yet).
I'm afraid since it's olaf Riot probably won't care very much, but as a fan of underplayed champs in general, here, take my upvote.
Could it be a latency issue? The skill could have hit you before you were able to see it.

What Qetzel said.  I suspect that Afic can't reproduce this, because he probably has little to no latency to the server.  Probably what's happening is that on Vi's client, she has already hit you while on Olaf's client, she's still traveling towards him.
That's odd. I got ulted by a Vi in an Olaf game and I didn't get knocked up, but her damage and animation still went off.
